resources.string:
Welcome to our app Niki Restaurant Table reservation where you can reserve table.

Niki app is used for the table reservation where you can reserve table beforehand and save your time.You can decide where you want to seat and you dont have to wait in a long queue for your chance to come.This app is develop for reducing customer waiting time.

The Niki app is still young it is growing fast.Niki measures their success on your experience.Which is why they welcome your comments and feedback.you can reach them at the given no.


Phone no:-1234567890
Address :-xyz

Always on time!

Expect the best experience from us. 
The app is designed to reduce your waiting time and provide you the best experience
